about.title: About Me
content: Welcome to my massage therapy practice. I specialize in providing a calm and healing environment where you can escape the stresses of everyday life.
With years of experience in various massage techniques, I tailor each session to meet your specific needs and preferences.
My approach combines traditional methods with modern techniques to ensure you receive the most effective treatment for your body.

testimonials.name: Sarah
testimonials.text: The most relaxing massage experience I've ever had. The atmosphere was perfect and I felt completely renewed afterward.

testimonials.name: David
testimonials.text: I've been dealing with chronic back pain for years. After just three sessions, I noticed a significant improvement in my mobility and comfort.

testimonials.name: Rachel
testimonials.text: A truly professional service. The attention to detail and personalized approach made all the difference in my wellness journey.
